name: Chicago wards & precincts
body:
### Chicago wards and precincts shapefiles

These Chicago wards and precincts boundary shapefiles are effective as of early
2015. As of Thursday, February 26, 2015, the shapefiles on the [City of
Chicago’s data portal](https://data.cityofchicago.org/) are stale—they are the
boundaries from before the city council voted to redraw them in 2012.

### Source

The original source material was provided by the [Chicago Board of
Elections][boe] in response to a FOIA request, in the form of 50 shapefiles
corresponding to precinct boundaries and attributes in each Chicago ward.

[I][pas] applied minimal post-processing to produce various formats, and to
generate ward boundaries by aggregating precincts and unioning their geometries.

### Download

#### Chicago 2015 Wards

 * Download **[Shapefile](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_precincts.zip)**
 * Download **[TopoJSON](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_precincts_topo.json)**
 * Download **[GeoJSON](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_precincts.json)**
 * Download **[KML](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_precincts.kml)**

#### Chicago 2015 Precincts

 * Download **[GeoJSON](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_wards.json)**
 * Download **[KML](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_wards.kml)**
 * Download **[Shapefile](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_wards.zip)**
 * Download **[TopoJSON](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_wards_topo.json)**

#### Chicago 2015 Combined Wards & Precincts

 * Download **[PostgreSQL dump](https://github.com/paulsmith/chicago_wards_and_precincts/blob/2528342e082073fd8055db127eb7330bd77fc3d9/chicago_2015_wards_precincts.sql.gz)**



### Support or Contact

Having trouble with these files? Email Paul Smith at
[paulsmith@pobox.com](mailto:paulsmith@pobox.com).

[pas]: https://pauladamsmith.com/
[boe]: http://www.chicagoelections.com/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
